column4: I need help from a really skilled person now. I can't make a folder i mnt without sudo. I know I'm not suposed to change the right in home, so what can I do?
I beleive MSN works in Wine or Cedega?
I'm not sure about that, but why use Windowsapplications when there is Linuxversion. Games is another point, there is Cedega or Wine the only options.
I use Gaim so I can't help you with that.
